name: HTC Pyflow
description: A python package for calculating the heat transfer coefficient of a user-specified fluid moving through a variety of geometries. Fluid calculations are performed in C++ and called by the python wrapper.

name: SAM extension
description: A fork of the NREL System Advisor Model. Created for research regarding the implementation of topology optimized particle-to-sCO2 SiC heat exchangers in concentrated solar power applications.

name: SAMplot
description: A data parsing and plot utils package for interfacing with SAM simulation products. Optimized to easily handle millions of data entries for dynamic data filtering, selection, and analysis.

name: ATE Temperature Probe Calibration
description: Automated test equipment for temperature probe calibration. Designed for tool-free installation, ergonomic access, and long life. Capable of withstanding temperatures greater than 120C.
